alert.note: Alert for Sharkey; Yazoo (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued December 13 at 11:28PM CST until December 14 at 12:15AM CST by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...A TORNADO WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1215 AM CST FOR NORTHWESTERN YAZOO...EAST CENTRAL ISSAQUENA AND SOUTHERN SHARKEY COUNTIES... At 1128 PM CST, a confirmed large and extremely dangerous tornado was located near Valley Park, moving northeast at 40 mph. This is a PARTICULARLY DANGEROUS SITUATION. TAKE COVER NOW! HAZARD...Damaging tornado. SOURCE...Law enforcement confirmed tornado. IMPACT...You are in a life-threatening situation. Flying debris may be deadly to those caught without shelter. Mobile homes will be destroyed. Considerable damage to homes, businesses, and vehicles is likely and complete destruction is possible. The tornado will be near... Holly Bluff around 1155 PM CST. Yazoo City around 1220 AM CST. TORNADO...OBSERVED TORNADO DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE MAX HAIL SIZE...1.25 IN
info.instruction: To repeat, a large, extremely dangerous and potentially deadly tornado is on the ground. To protect your life, TAKE COVER NOW! Move to a basement or an interior room on the lowest floor of a sturdy building. Avoid windows. If you are outdoors, in a mobile home, or in a vehicle, move to the closest substantial shelter and protect yourself from flying debris.
